summary: **The Cosby Show** was a popular American TV sitcom that aired from 1984 to 1992. It starred Bill Cosby as Cliff Huxtable and focused on an upper middle-class Black-American family living in Brooklyn. The show was based on Cosby's stand-up comedy about his family. It was a huge hit, reviving the sitcom genre and helping to create more TV shows with predominantly Black casts. The show and its spin-off, **A Different World**, were very successful, making the cast famous and turning Cosby into the highest-paid TV actor. It was also popular worldwide and influenced how Black Americans and working mothers were portrayed on TV.
title: The Cosby Show
